name: Crimea Blue
description: Crimea Blue is a hybrid strain bred by Barney's Farm that is a cross between Blueberry and Crimean hash plant.  This short plant completes flowering in 8 to 9 weeks and produces higher than average yields.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Sleepy, Creative, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Nausea, Depression, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Headache
